body:

>Few addendums to Bruce's announcement.  First, the site relys on

>me off the list, and I will be happy to explain it to you.  Still
>working on what to do if someone comes in w/o JavaScript on, but
>that is becoming very rare these days.

Basically that means if your computer sucks, your screwed.

>Second, please do not hesitate to send myself or Bruce feedback
>on the site.  I do not care if it is positive or negative.  We
>are constantly bouncing ideas off of each other to make the

>look and feel of the site are most welcome.  We want to make
>the site a good source of information that is easy to use

Yeah, please. I just love it when people make me feel bad about my site and 
make my miserable life more miserable. Hehe. Yeah, but blast the site all 
you want. If we don't we'll be forced to put a guestbook and message board 
on our site, we all know how bad that can be. Also, the petition is fucking 
petitiful, come on people, sign the god damned thing. I think we are close 
to 300, thats about 9700 away from my goal :)
